title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: San Salvatore, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by David Lee, “We’re enjoying an autumn break in Ticino, Switzerland! This is a view of Lugano (Lake & city) and San Salvatore, from Mount Brè.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: San Salvatore, Switzerland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
